response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and significance, we believe it's only fitting that such a remarkable item should find its way into the hands of someone who truly appreciates its worth. Considering the exceptional quality and unique features of this product, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $1,500,000 and provides you with an unparalleled opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a highly favorable rate.

Should you choose to accept this offer, I assure you that you will be receiving nothing but the best service and support throughout the entire transaction process. We take pride in ensuring that every customer is satisfied with their purchase and feels valued as part of our esteemed clientele.

Please let me know if you require any further information or have any questions about the product or the offer. I look forward to the possibility of working with you and delivering this extraordinary product to its new home.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
